name: driver-schedule-sass
description: Driver Schedule SASS Project is a web application that allows users to create and manage schedules for drivers. The app includes features for user registration, login, and admin approval. It also provides a print option for the schedules.
author: Ivo Kalendarov <ivokalendar@icloud.com>

scripts.build: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
